r.d: This package provides PDF generation using only PHP, without requiring any external libraries.
r.n: * Fixed loading of font metrics in setFont(). * Fixed typo preventing setFillColor() and setDrawColor() from accepting any other colorspace than 'rgb' (Horde Bug 1276). * Allow to use factory() method with custom class extended from File_PDF (Bug 1543). * Fixed typo in link() (Bug 1737). * Fixed save() method to actually save the whole document (Bug 1768).
